privacy.cookieMessage: We use cookies to improve your experience. Choose your preferences below.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.text: We only collect data necessary to provide the service. This includes your message (which is protected with encryption), information about your internet connection (which is made anonymous), and information about which browser you use (partially anonymized).

dataUsage.title: How We Use Data
dataUsage.text: Your message is stored securely until it is viewed or expires. Information about your internet connection and browser is made anonymous immediately and used only to ensure the service works correctly and to protect against abuse.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.text: Secrets are automatically deleted after viewing or expiration. Logs are retained for 90 days and then automatically deleted.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.text: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
yourRights.right1: Request information about what data we have about you
yourRights.right2: Request deletion of your data (if identifiable)
yourRights.right3: Contact us with questions about data protection
